name: Risk of Rain 2: Index
description: This app is a reference tool for Risk of Rain 2. Search or sort by category to find detailed information about items you encounter in-game.  Eleven language translations: * English * Deutsche (German) * Espaol (Spanish) * Franais (French) * Italiano (Italian) * Portugus (Portuguese) * Trke (Turkish) *  (Russian) *  (Japanese) *  (Simplified Chinese) *  (Korean)
